TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为派生自 类的控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，从 "源" 切换到设计视图时，会分析描述从类派生的控件的标记， 并在设计图面上创建该控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时，设计时控件代码将持久保存到标记源，并将其编辑为网页的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page. 从抽象基类派生的设计器为 从类派生的控件提供设计时支持 。Designers that are derived from the abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class.

related.span: ASP.NET 控件设计器简介

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 设计图面上创建关联的控件时，.NET Framework 在内部构造从类派生的设计器的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，一般会从上一个数据源卸载事件，然后将新事件附加到新数据源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.

returns.span: 如果执行了与新数据源的连接（通常是这种情况），则为 ；如果新旧数据源相同，则为 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; if the old and new data sources are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现 通常涉及来自前一个数据源的解除事件，然后将新事件附加到新的数据源。The implementation of the method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，为关联 对象创建新的数据源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关 显示可用于为关联控件创建数据源的对话框的替代的示例，请参见 。For an example of a override that displays a dialog that can be used to create a data source for the associated control, see .

para.span: 重写 方法以提供一种 在设计时为关联对象创建控件的方法 。

span.span: Override the method to provide a means of creating a control for the associated object at design time.

Protected MustOverride Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

span.span: The with which this designer is associated.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，执行必要的操作以设置从 类派生的关联控件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 从类派生的设计器中重写方法时 ，执行必要的操作以设置数据绑定控件，以便在检索设计时标记时，控件正确呈现。When you override the method in a designer that is derived from the class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly. 通常，出于性能方面的考虑，您将关联设计时数据源而不是实时数据源。Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.

summary.span: 获取或设置关联控件的 属性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property for the associated control.

value.span: 由 派生的关联控件使用的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于隐藏 与此设计器关联的类的属性。The property is used to shadow the property of the class that is associated with this designer. 此属性的值 由设计器保留，作为为基础对象生成的标记上的数据绑定表达式 。The value of the property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying object.

param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从所有数据源事件中卸载设计器的事件处理程序。The method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 生成用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.

returns.span: 用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前，类会在设计时检索用于绑定的示例数据。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 如果控件不是数据绑定的，则会调用 方法。If the control is not data bound, it calls the method. 如果呈现控件时出错，它将调用 方法。If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the method.

related.span: ASP.NET 控件设计器简介

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 如果控件为空，或者无法检索数据源，则提供在设计时用来呈现控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.

returns.span: 用于在设计时使用空的数据源来呈现该控件的标记。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前，类会在设计时检索用于绑定的示例数据。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 空设计时控件呈现为一个占位符，其中包含类型名称和控件名称。The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.

related.span: ASP.NET 控件设计器简介

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The that was thrown.

summary.span: 提供发生错误时用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 用于发生错误时在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误设计时控件呈现为一个占位符，其中包含类型名称、控件名称和描述错误的消息。The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.

param.span: 由 派生的实现 的控件。

span.span: A control derived from , which implements .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器宿主 准备好使用设计器呈现派生自类的控件时，将调用方法 。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the class. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并连接设计器操作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(bool forceUpdateView) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceChanged (forceUpdateView As Boolean)
abstract member OnDataSourceChanged : bool -> unit override this.OnDataSourceChanged : bool -> unit

param.name: forceUpdateView
param.span: 强制更新设计时标记时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, .

summary.span: 关联 对象的数据源发生更改时被调用。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法连接到当前数据源。The method connects to the current data source. 如果当前数据源与控件之前连接到的数据源不同，或 `forceUpdateView` 为，则将 `true` 在设计图面上重新绘制关联控件。If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.

para.span: 重写 方法，以执行当关联控件的数据源发生更改时所需的其他操作。

span.span: Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when the data source of the associated control changes.

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请在执行其他处理之前调用基实现。

span.span: If you override the method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed
abstract member OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit override this.OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关联 对象的数据源加载新架构时被调用。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object loads a new schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法处理 事件，当关联控件绑定到的数据源的架构发生更改时，将引发该事件。The method handles the event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes. 重写 方法，以执行新架构可用时所需的其他操作。Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 该 包含要筛选的属性。

span.span: The containing the properties to filter.

summary.span: 供设计器用于在“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法使用 设计器实现的相应设计时属性来隐藏各种控件属性，以及在 " **属性** " 网格中添加或删除属性。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 对于 类，将 隐藏控件的 属性。For the class, the shadows the property of the control. 它将创建的属性数组的副本 ，然后将这些属性添加到 "隐藏" 属性。It makes a copy of the attribute array of the , and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property. 它将 隐藏属性的属性设置 为， `false` 除非控件的属性的属性 已设置为 `true` 。It sets the attribute of the shadowed property to `false` unless the attribute of the property of the control is already set to `true`.

para.span: 重写 方法，以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
